column.name: TIMETOEXECUTE

table.name: ChatStates
table.description: Contains all possible chat states.

column.name: ID
column.description: Id for chat states

column.name: STATUS
column.description: The status name.

column.name: IS_PENDING
column.description: Indicates whether the chat state is pending or not. Takes a value 0 or 1.

table.name: Chat
table.description: Stores all chat details

column.name: ID
column.description: Id for chat

column.name: STATUS
column.description: The chat status id.

column.name: START
column.description: The time of start of the chat

column.name: FINISH
column.description: The time of completion of the chat

column.name: SITEID
column.description: The site of the chat request.

column.name: GROUPID
column.description: The group of the chat request if available.

column.name: IS_REOPENED
column.description: Indicates whether the chat has been reopened or not. Takes the value 0 or 1.

column.name: TITLE
column.description: Title of the chat, decided by the technician

column.name: SENDERID
column.description: User who intiated the chat

column.name: IS_TECH_CHAT
column.description: Boolean to indicate whether chat is tech to tech chat or tech to requester chat

table.name: ChatUsers
table.description: Stores user states in each chat.

column.name: ID
column.description: Primary key identifier

column.name: CHATID
column.description: The chat user id.

column.name: USERID
column.description: The chat user id.

column.name: STATUS
column.description: The chat user status id.

column.name: TIME
column.description: The time of user status change

column.name: CHAT_INFOID
column.description: Chat Info Id

column.name: CHATID
column.description: The chat id.

column.name: TIME
column.description: The time of saving the chat message.

column.name: FROMUSER
column.description: The sender of the message

column.name: TYPE
column.description: Type of Chat message text/note/attachment

column.name: CHAT_INFOID
column.description: Chat Info id

column.name: MESSAGE
column.description: The message

column.name: CHAT_INFOID
column.description: Chat Info id

column.name: NOTE
column.description: The contents of the note.

column.name: SHARE
column.description: Indicates whether the note is visible to other technicians or not.

column.name: CHAT_INFOID
column.description: Chat Info id

column.name: CHATID
column.description: The chat id.

column.name: CHAT_JSON
column.description: whole chat transcript as JSON

column.name: MAPPINGID
column.description: Chat ID

column.name: CHATID
column.description: Chat ID

column.name: REQUESTID
column.description: The request id for which the chat is associated with.

table.name: BROADCAST_MESSAGES
table.description: This table contains the broadcast message sent by the technicians

table.name: MenuVsTempId
table.description: This table contains admp templateid to sdp menuid mapping

table.name: Chat_Notifications
table.description: This table contains chat count notifications

column.name: TYPE
column.description: Column to hold information about type(To/CC).

column.name: TYPE
column.description: Column to hold information about type(To/CC).

column.name: TYPE
column.description: Column to hold information about type(To/CC).

table.name: LifecycleHistory
table.description: This table will hold history of LifeCycle.

column.name: OPERATIONOWNERID
column.description: Holds the information regarding who performed this operation.

column.name: OPERATIONTIME
column.description: Holds the information of when this operation is performed.

column.name: OPERATION
column.description: Holds the operation type.

table.name: LifecycleHistoryDiff
table.description: This table will hold the diff of lifecycle.
